alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Victoria and northeastern Refugio Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wood Hi, or 12 miles south of Edna, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Placedo, Green Lake, Tivoli and Long Mott. This includes US Highway 87 between mile markers 824 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Calhoun; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
